roleset.name: laugh out loud (but convey it via text)

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: I actually LOL'd wiserita , so very true .

example.name: alternate arg1 form
example.text: I lol'd to the fact that Justin Bieber has his own movie now.
example.arg: to the fact that Justin Bieber has his own movie now.

roleset.note: LOL-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls (from lol.01-v)
I expect the usage of this as a verb is still evolving. If you see it use any args that aren't listed here, we should definitely add them. For now, I'm leaving it here. (from lol.01-v)
